statements: SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, risk_factor FROM patients WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT patient_id, age, diagnosis, risk_factor FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY risk_factor DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' AND risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE risk_factor BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND (age < 40 OR risk_factor > 0.7);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis='Flu' ORDER BY record_date;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, risk_level FROM Patients AS p INNER JOIN HealthRecords AS hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM HealthRecords WHERE risk_level > 3);
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE HealthRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, factor_name, timestamp FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_value > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, m.treatment FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.patient_name, r.factor_name, r.factor_value FROM patients p LEFT JOIN risk_factors r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.factor_value > 5;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.age, m.diagnosis, r.factor_name FROM patients p LEFT JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id LEFT JOIN risk_factors r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE m.date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthRecords WHERE health_condition LIKE 'Diabetes%';
SELECT patient_id, risk_factor, risk_score FROM RiskFactors WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_outcome FROM Predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, record_date, health_condition FROM PatientHealthRecords WHERE health_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT Patients.name, RiskFactors.risk_factor, RiskFactors.risk_score FROM Patients JOIN RiskFactors ON Patients.patient_id = RiskFactors.patient_id WHERE Patients.age < 50;

SELECT Patients.name, PatientHealthRecords.record_date, Predictions.predicted_outcome FROM Patients JOIN Predictions ON Patients.patient_id = Predictions.patient_id WHERE Predictions.prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_id, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, prediction_date FROM Predictions WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(risk_score) AS total_risk_score FROM HighRiskPatients GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT Patients.name, HealthRecords.visit_date FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE HealthRecords.diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
